description: A Logia-type Devil Fruit that allows the user to create, control, and transform into magma at will, turning the user into a Magma Human. The fruit grants devastating offensive power with extreme heat and destructive capabilities.

users.circumstances: Akainu had already consumed the fruit before this episode, but his powers are revealed for the first time here

abilityReveals.description: The user transforms their fist into pure magma and launches it forward like an oversized rocket, burning everything in its path and creating devastating area damage.
abilityReveals.firstUseContext: Akainu uses Dai Funka to instantly evaporate Jozu's massive ice block and create a volcanic meteor shower.

abilityReveals.description: The user can transform their body into magma, granting them the standard Logia intangibility and the ability to attack with extreme heat.
abilityReveals.firstUseContext: Akainu's body transforms into magma as he prepares to destroy the ice block.

abilityReveals.description: The user can create and launch volcanic rocks that rain down like meteors, igniting everything they touch.
abilityReveals.firstUseContext: After destroying the ice block, Akainu's attack creates a massive meteor shower that destroys ships and sets the battlefield ablaze.

weaknesses.weakness: Standard Devil Fruit weakness - inability to swim and weakness to seawater

strengths.strength: Extreme destructive power and heat capable of instantly evaporating ice
strengths.description: The magma can evaporate massive ice blocks and create widespread fire damage.
Can create meteor showers that cover large areas of the battlefield.

name.japanese: トリトリの実 モデル:不死鳥
name.romanized: Tori Tori no Mi, Moderu: Fushichō

description: A Mythical Zoan-type Devil Fruit that allows the user to transform into a phoenix and a human-phoenix hybrid at will.

users.circumstances: Marco had already consumed this fruit before this episode

abilityReveals.description: Marco uses his phoenix transformation to create a defensive technique capable of blocking powerful attacks from admirals.
abilityReveals.firstUseContext: Marco uses Fujiazami to ward off Kizaru's Yasakani no Magatama attack, protecting Whitebeard.

strengths.description: Can block even Kizaru's light-based attacks.

description: A Logia-type Devil Fruit that allows the user to create, control, and transform into light at will.

users.circumstances: Kizaru had already consumed this fruit before this episode

abilityReveals.description: The user crosses their arms in front of them and uses both hands to fire a torrent of deadly light particles.
abilityReveals.firstUseContext: Kizaru uses this technique to attack Whitebeard from above, though Marco blocks it.
